duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement HR policies and procedures
Oversee the performance management system, including appraisals, feedback, and training programs
Provide direction and support to management and staff on employee relations issues
Ensure compliance with all federal and state employment laws and regulations
Handle employee complaints, grievances, and disputes in a timely and equitable manner
Maintain accurate employee records and oversee benefits administration

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
